description:
The Lower East Side is a great spot for solo adventurers and young couple, one of Manhattan's fashionable neighborhoods with tons of restaurants, bars and boutiques. Though you'll still find a few survivors of its Jewish origins like Katz's Deli, an icon of the LES. 
Our place is spacious and bright thanks to the east-facing windows. We have all the comforts you need such as wifi, TV and a Nespresso machine, a super cosy queen-sized bed and a comfy sofa that can be used for extra sleeping space.
name: Spacious Apartment in the Heart of LES
review: The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
